content: over coffee * wrap by rebecca krolikowski www crazyhatlady com i named this wrap after the beautiful yarn that was gifted to me a year ago by a dear friend the yarn is * selah s www hyenacart com/selah over coffee licorice twist* merino wool yarn and it is just breath taking i frogged the original wrap i started out with when i though i could not get anymore of the yarn but julie at selah came through and surprised me you can use any yarn really but you will get a different sized wrap but the finished product will still look beautiful at the time i am still finishing my wrap but this is a very easy mindless wrap to make and is just a stitch that is repeated over and over again so i thought it would not be fair to charge for it and decided to offer it free to everyone i am exactly at the half way point and my wrap measures 14 x 30 so a good estimation is that it will be 14 x 60 when it is finished you are free to make these for your personal use and even to sell your completed project but please do not reproduce this pattern for sale and no mass productions please i like to help out us little people who try to earn money one project at a time gauge really gauge is unimportant you can use whatever yarn you wish that you happen to have at hand and whatever hook you prefer and be surprised with it you can even use up your scrap yarn of similar weight but for those of you who must have a gauge here it is 4 x4 = 11 row and 3 of vertical scallops materials 12 oz selah licorice twist merino over coffee approx 840 yards worsted weight h hook blunt yarn needle stitches chain chain single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet stitch pattern from 30 easy-to-crochet pattern stitches from leisure arts chain 70 row 1 make 3 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook skip 2 chains single_crochet in next chain *chain 3 skip next 3 chs 3 double_crochet in next chain skip next 2 chs single_crochet in next chain * repeat from * to * to end ending with single_crochet row 2 chain 2 turn 3 double_crochet in first single_crochet skip next 2 double_crochet single_crochet in 3rd double_crochet *chain 3 skip next 3 chs 3 double_crochet in next chain skip next 2 chs single_crochet in next chain * repeat from * to * to end ending with single_crochet row 3 and beyond repeat row 2 until desired length finish off weave in ends
